column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Wait , Beifong ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Well then , why are you treating me like a criminal ?
#Text=Avatar Aang and your mother were friends .
#Text=They saved the world together .
#Text=" Lin says : " That 's ancient history .
#Text=And it 's got diddly - squat to do with the mess you 're in right now .
#Text=You ca n't just waltz in here and dole out vigilante justice like you own the place !
#Text=" Metalbending cop says : " Chief , Councilman Tenzin is here .
#Text=" Lin says : " Let him in .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin , sorry ... I got a little sidetracked on my way to see you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Lin , you are looking radiant as usual .
#Text=" Lin says : " Cut the garbage , Tenzin .
#Text=Why is the Avatar in Republic City ?
#Text=I thought you were supposed to be moving down to the South Pole to train her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " My relocation has been delayed .
#Text=The Avatar , on the other hand , will be heading back to the South Pole immediately , where she will stay put .

#Text=" Korra says : " But — " Tenzin says : " If you would be so kind as to drop the charges against Korra , I will take full responsibility for today 's regrettable events and cover all the damages .
#Text="
